name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Desert theme tic-tac-toe. Play with family and friends!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play a classic game of tic-tac-toe with family and friends!
The game involves the need for 2 players, x and o, who fight for the bragging rights that come along with winning the game.
Connect 3 of your piece in a straight line to win, and if a draw occurs, feel free to hit that "Restart" button to play again!

Enjoy the gentle-on-the-eye, unique, desert theme!

and of course...          Have fun!!!!
